name: CubeStory
description:
There's a place, above all the Game Engine that no developer is aware of. A place that is being destroyed mysteriously by an antimatter virus and Cube needs to get out of there and find out what happened to your creator, the GAMEMAKER. Join Cube in this journey full of secrets through the dangerous path to reach to the Hard Disk and get the full information he needs.

This Game is Also available on Gamejolt.com : https://gamejolt.com/games/cubestory/468120

CubeStory. Game Created by WinterFall VideoGames.

GAME CONTROLS:

Use A,S,D,W or ARROW KEYS to move across the scenary

Press SPACE to Jump. While in the air, press A,D,W,S or ARROW KEYS to move

When you see a wall, press SPACE with Up to climb

To move across the wall, keep pressing UP and use the ARROW KEYS or A,D to move.
